headline.main: RIBBENTROP CALLED BOMB PLOT TARGET; One of Four on Trial in Papen Case Tells of Attack's Aim

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, April 1 (Delayed) (U.P.) -- Abdurrahman Sayman, one of four men put on trial today on the charge of trying to kill Franz von Papen, German Am bassador to Turkey, asserted that the conspirators had intended to kill Joachim yon Ribbentrop, German Foreign Minister, too.
abstract: Turkish trial for A Sayman, S Sagol, L Karlinov and G Pavloff, German Amb von Papen's attempted assassins, opens; Sayman reveals Foreign Min von Ribbentrop also was target; O Tokat revealed as bombing victim

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
